com.captiveimagination.jgn.server
Class NetworkingServer

java.lang.Object
  com.captiveimagination.jgn.server.NetworkingServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class NetworkingServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

NetworkingServer is a convenience class for servers handling clients in a client/server architecture.

Author:
Matthew D. Hicks

update

public void update()
Call this method to handle management of server in a single threaded environment. You can new Thread(networkingServer).start() to run threaded.

getTCPMessageServer

public TCPMessageServer getTCPMessageServer()
Returns:
The local TCPMessageServer being used to send and receive messages or null if one is not set.

getUDPMessageServer

public UDPMessageServer getUDPMessageServer()
Returns:
The local UDPMessageServer being used to send and receive messages or null if one is not set.

getPlayerMessageServer

public MessageServer getPlayerMessageServer()
Returns:
The local MessageServer being used to send and receive player messages. This favors TCPMessageServer if it is set.
